title: RIOT PLEASE FIX YOUR FUCKING GAME
body:
YOUR FUCKING GAME IS BROKEN.
PLEASE FUCKING NERF DARIUS U KNOW THAT HE IS FUCKING BROKEN AF AND YOU STILL DONT GIVE A SHIT ABOUT WHAT THE FANS THINK.DARIUS IS FUCKING BROKEN AND THE FUCKING IDIOTS AT RIOT ARE NOT DOINT ANYTHING TO ACTUALLY DO SOMETHING ABOUT HIM.PLEASE FUCKING NERF THIS GUY.{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: He's broken yet he's one of the most kite-able champions in the game? Yeah I don't think so
What fitzky said, play gnar into him, you'll be right

Step 1 to beating Darius:

Stop playing Nasus.
Pretty sure since the Nasus buffs, Darius loses mid-game and on if the Nasus is capable of proper spacing.

The caps lock key is located on the left below tab and above shift.
You're welcome.
